showScoreExcerpt:
"A lot about this crazy operatic production a is mind-blowing. First of all, there is the elaborate staging…Second, there is the awesome talent of the cast…The first act seems a tad long…Because you are entering midstream, it takes some time to grasp the basics of who these people are…But by the time the second act rolls around, you have started to see the characters more clearly – and, besides, you cannot withstand the charms of Russian melodrama any longer."
